H

HASH_ALGORITHM - Static variable in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Algorithm used to hash the password given by the user.
hashImage(File) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.Utils
Hashes an image to return a password value by adding up the diagonal pixels.
header - Variable in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Contains information about the embedded data.
height - Variable in class Steganography.Logic.HiddenData
Hidden image height.
HiddenData - Class in Steganography.Logic
The HiddenData class is used to store information on the data to embed/extract during the steganographic process.
HiddenData(byte[]) - Constructor for class Steganography.Logic.HiddenData
Creates a HiddenData object from a byte array
hideByte(byte) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.GifSteganography
Hides one byte into the least significant bit of 8 consecutive pixels using GifSteganography.embed(int, char).
hideByte(byte, int, int, byte) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageSteganography
Hides one byte using ImageSteganography.embed(byte, int, int, byte).
hidePixel(int, int) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageInImageSteganography
Hides The 3 MSBs of the red, green and blue color components of pixelB.
